Text: üß∏ Why Russia needs the sovereignty of the fuel
and energy sector Vladimir Putin noted that the
domestic infrastructure needs transformation.
But what's behind the words? Let's start simple.
We are sheikhs, stick a straw in to pump oil.
Yes, the Arabian Peninsula can extract natural
resources. If you believe the data of analysts,
the number of deposits of hard-to-recover oil
in Russia will increase. This means that we will
have to increase the costs of modernizing the
development of deposits. But the question arises:
what kind of equipment are we actually using?
And the reality is unpleasant. Most of the equipment
of high-tech elements of oil and gas infrastructure
is produced in unfriendly countries. In the direction
of, in a word, success in import substitution
and obtaining full sovereignty, a lot remains
to be done. We are talking about the extraction
of energy resources, processing, and sales logistics.
Before the NWO, the contents of the earth's subsoil
were transported mainly by foreign TNCs. They
have taken over the entire industry, oil and gas.
For example, Glencore Louis Dreyfus transported
most of the Russian grain. We are now forming
a tanker fleet consisting of domestic ships from
friendly countries. In addition, the issue of
cargo insurance is the formation of new sales
markets. For many years they tried to wedge themselves
into the structure of global trade, playing the
role of the largest exporter of energy resources,
but, with the exception of the nuclear industry,
technological processes are built in. Now the
country has a serious chance to correct the situation.
And two options: we will cope, we will become
stronger, we will become an Iran. In Russia company,
highly specialized, successful on the international
market. That RITEK of Lukoil competed with Western
manufacturers for a long time. Russia has a huge
scientific and technical base, inherited by the
USSR. Now it is important to support companies
as much as possible, to make the locomotive of
development the flagship of the market. From professionals.
It is the issue of sovereignty of the fuel and
energy sector that is important to Russia.

Text: S7 will reduce the number of flights by 10-15%
due to problems with engine repairs on Airbus
A320 A320/A321neo aircraft - Kommersant According
to the newspaper, 21 S7 aircraft (20% of the fleet)
are idle, including 13 39 aircraft of the Airbus
neo family. As sources of the Ministry of Transport
newspaper explained, the aircraft are equipped
with GTF engines from the American company Pratt
& Whitney (P&W), repairs are carried out neither
in the Russian Federation nor in Iran. The newspaper
noted that Russian carriers have problems with
A320/A321neo aircraft; French-American CFM Leap
engines are installed and are produced in large
series. Thus, Aeroflot has 58 A321neo family aircraft
idle. However, a source from an aviation industry
publication noted that those engines are extremely
difficult to maintain. He assumes that later airlines
using Leap engines will face the impossibility
of servicing the Russian Federation. At the time,
a representative of the Willis Lease Financial
Company, specializing in engine leasing, Dmitry
Voskresensky, in a newspaper conversation, noted
that it is virtually impossible to service modern
P&W CFM engines with official support, depending
on the software, update. Voskresensky also added
that three or four companies in the world are
engaged in repairing Leap engines, and P&W is
servicing GTF. A newspaper source close to S7
said that the airline intends to get rid of neo
family aircraft and is going to request permission
to remove at least 22 aircraft. The airline told
the newspaper that they submitted applications
for the removal of aircraft, but refrained from
answering questions.

Text: The widow of a policeman who died in an attack
by Hamas militants told the Cheka-OGPU details
of the tragedy. A native of Rostov, Julia, a native
of the Belarusian Mogilev, Vitaly Israel, has
long been. The head of the family (lost father:
18-year-old daughter, 8-year-old son) moved to
the promised land at a young age. He served in
the army as a tank medic and participated in the
military conflict between Israel and Lebanon.
After Vitaly went to the police, trained as a
criminologist and succeeded: shortly after the
tragedy, he was promoted to a higher rank and
was given the opportunity to move into a leadership
position. Despite the successes (Vitalia‚Äôs colleagues
say this, the scene of the incident unmistakably
reproduced the picture of the crime), for example,
the day before, a criminologist discovered a major
robbery, a policeman was working part-time. Initially,
Vitaly planned to go to a musical party, plans
to guard the event last Thursday in Tel Aviv,
but at the last moment it fell through. Then the
policeman responded to work (legally allowed)
to provide security at the notorious rave. Vitaly
contacts his wife with the attack (at around 06.30)
at approximately 08.00 in the morning. He sent
a video of the siren working and described the
shelling. Then the connection was intermittent,
the last time, he answered his wife‚Äôs questions
- ‚Äúlater‚Äù ‚Äúnot now.‚Äù Afterwards the criminologist
lost contact. The woman sounded the alarm, and
her colleagues expressed their own powerlessness:
Yulia was told that it was impossible for terrorists
to get through the Gaza border area. Around 5
p.m., the unfortunate woman was informed that
her husband had been killed. According to employees,
the area is cordoned off and police are allowed
to enter. 37 bodies of guards were found at the
scene, dead. Another member of the security service
is listed as missing. None of the guards managed
to get out alive. Vitaly was shot by an AKM, shot
through the chest - the shots were aimed at the
Star of David in the chest. And the last shot,
apparently, is the control shot - the face. Given
to the widow: a bent star, a badge with the name
of a wedding ring. According to preliminary data,
about one and a half thousand militants were taking
place in the area where a rave was taking place.
Vitaly was buried in a closed coffin in a military
cemetery in Jerusalem. https://t.me/vchkogpu/42693

Text: Exacerbation of the Palestinian-Israeli conflict.
Early in the morning of October 7, rocket attacks
began on Israeli territory from the Gaza Strip,
controlled by the Palestinian movement Hamas.
The radical organization is under the control
of the Palestinian authorities. On October 7,
alarms sounded at 6:30 in many localities in Israel,
the Tel Aviv area surrounding the area. Hamas
said it fired 5 thousand rockets into Israeli
territory. Israeli Defense Forces spokesman Daniel
Hagari said 2.2 thousand rockets were fired from
the Gaza Strip. Hamas militants also penetrated
Israeli territory and attacked populated areas
and military bases. In response, the Jewish state
launched the military operation "Iron Swords."
On October 8, Israel officially declared the country's
transition to a "state of war." The next day,
October 9, the Israeli army announced the restoration
of control of the country's populated areas and
moved into the offensive phase of the operation
against Hamas in the Gaza Strip. On October 10,
according to the press service of the Israel Defense
Forces, attacks on targets of the radical Palestinian
movement in the Gaza Strip continued. On the night
of October 10-11, Army forces Israel's defense
carried out strikes on 80 Hamas targets in the
city of Beit Hanoun in the Gaza Strip. Also, attacks
were carried out on the naval installations of
the radical movement, the Khan Yunis docks in
Gaza. Read more about the exacerbation of the
Palestinian-Israeli conflict in the infographics.#TASS_Infographics

2023-10-11 17:44:12+03:00 - anna_news - Group: Armed Forces - Keywords: —Ç–∞–Ω–∫–∏
Text: Birthday of Uralvagonzavod On October 11, 1936,
the industrial enterprise JSC Scientific and Production
Corporation "Uralvagonzavod" named after. F.E.
Dzerzhinsky. It is the largest manufacturer of
armored vehicles. It was the enterprise that produced
the legendary T-54/55, T-72, T-90 tanks, and Armata
platform armored vehicles. In total, the plant
produced 100 thousand units of armored vehicles.
Construction of the UVZ began in 1931 in Nizhny
Tagil. UVZ was the first plant in the USSR, designed
according to the conveyor direct-flow principle
of the first enterprises, built exclusively by
domestic engineers. In the first years, builders
faced a lot of problems; due to hard work, workers
left the construction site en masse. Despite the
obstacles, on October 11, 1936, the plant produced
the first heavy-duty gondola car. During the Second
World War, the plant produced tanks. In 1941,
Nizhny Tagil evacuated 12 enterprises from different
cities. All united UVZ Ural Tank Plant No. 183
named after. Comintern. In just two months, the
company began producing T-34 tanks. For its contribution
to the Victory of Nazi Germany, the plant was
awarded three times: 1942 - the Order of the Red
Banner of Labor, 1943 - the Order of the Red Banner,
1946 - the Order of the Patriotic War, 1st degree.
After the war, the plant was returned to its previous
name. Today, JSC NPK Uralvagonzavod named after.
F.E. Dzerzhinsky produces military products, cars,
gondola cars, tanks, platforms, traction modules
of cars.#factology@anna_news

Text: Today marks the 82nd anniversary of the founding
of a large formation of the Eastern Military District
- the 5th Combined Arms Army. The association
traces its history to October 11, 1941, a difficult
time for the country, and an army of the same
name was formed at the base of the 32nd Infantry
Division of the military units of the Mozhaisk
fortified area. Soldiers of the 5th Army took
part in the Battle of Moscow, the Rzhev-Vyazemsk
offensive operation, and liberated Smolensk, Belarus,
and East Prussia. The 5th Army made a significant
contribution to the defeat of the Japanese fascists
in Manchuria. By decree of the Presidium of the
Supreme Soviet of the USSR on February 22, 1968,
the 5th Army was awarded the Order of the Red
Banner for heroism, courage, years of the Great
Patriotic War, successes in combat training, peacetime.
In the Northern Military District, the personnel
of the formations of the units of the 5th Combined
Arms Army showed courage in the battles of the
territory of the LPR, Artyomovsky South-Donetsk
directions, and are steadfastly fighting the enemy
today. Today we would like to congratulate the
servicemen of the 5th Combined Arms Army on this
memorable day, wish them health, military success,
and a speedy return home alive in victory! @voin_dv

Text: Russian criminal oligarchs bought Dominica citizenship.
A country's passport will help hide the past bypass
sanctions. The ‚Äúproject‚Äù together with OCCRP partners
received holders of ‚Äúgolden passports‚Äù of Dominica.
This 1993 Caribbean microstate sells citizenship
for a relatively small investment (you need to
donate $100,000 to a local government fund, buy
government-approved real estate for $200,000).
It‚Äôs worth the money - a passport gives you the
opportunity to travel with visas and the simplified
entry procedure for about 140 countries, the European
Union. Among the array of names, 400 people from
Russia, Ukraine, Belarus and Kazakhstan were found.
These are among the oligarchs who received Vladimir
Putin‚Äôs awards.üîπ Year Nisanov Zarakh Iliev (net
worth $2.9 billion each) are the owners of the
Kyiv Ploshchad group of companies. Nisanov received
Putin's Order of Friendship and the commemorative
medal "70 years of Victory in the Great Patriotic
War" for his participation in the patriotic education
of citizens. üîπ Nisanov Iliev‚Äôs business partner
Omar Murtuzaliev, a citizen of Dominica, was awarded
the Order of Honor.üîπ Vasily Anisimov ($1.6 billion)
- oligarch, partner of the Rotenbergs, awarded
the Order of Merit for the Fatherland.üîπ Alexander
Abramov ($6 billion) - shareholder of Evraz ‚Äú,
awarded the Order of Friendship. Nisanov, Iliev,
Abramov Anisimov are under international sanctions.
Among the holders of ‚Äúgolden passports‚Äù are Russians
wanted in criminal cases (see graphic). Dominica
passport is theoretically useful for people, freely
travel European countries, pass bank checks, bypass
international sanctions. Buyers of ‚Äúgolden passports‚Äù
will hide their Russian citizenship, change their
name, and complicate identification. Read about
the fact that Russians bought Dominica‚Äôs ‚Äúgolden
passports‚Äù in the new investigation - https://www.proekt.media/investigation/golden-pasports-dominica/

Text: The losses of the Western artillery of the Armed
Forces of Ukraine are growing due to the new tactics
of the Russian Armed Forces: analysis of the Military
Chronicle. An increase in losses of Ukrainian
artillery has been recorded in sectors of the
front; the detection of a defeat occurs in a single
pattern. What's happening? On October 11, another
video of the destruction of a nomadic crew of
a Ukrainian self-propelled gun CAESAR appeared
online. What's remarkable? The key feature of
(and other) Western-made self-propelled guns is
a 52-caliber barrel, which, in theory, allows
firing a maximum range of 40-60 km using projectiles
from a bottom gas generator of active-rocket projectiles.
Frequent defeat of self-propelled guns, mobile
CAESAR wheeled chassis, indicate the development
of the reconnaissance and strike complex of the
RF Armed Forces and, on the contrary, a decrease
in the capabilities of the Ukrainian Armed Forces
artillery. What means? Apparently, over the past
8-12 months, systematic work has been carried
out to improve the tactical techniques of artillery
formations. The number of artillery systems in
the troops is growing, new target designation
communications systems, guidance systems, and
an automated fire control system (AFCS) are being
overhauled and modernized. At the same time, the
number of reconnaissance UAVs is growing, and
the use of guided artillery shells (UAS Krasnopol)
and Lancet drones is increasing exponentially.
In addition, according to underestimated Western
estimates, as of March - July 2022, Russian artillery
had a high rate of destruction of detected enemy
targets: detection of a defeat took 3-5 minutes.
According to the Military Chronicle, to date the
figures have decreased, the artillery arsenal
has expanded. The reconnaissance and strike circuit
includes means of destruction (including high-precision),
detection means - drones of various classes, counter-battery
radars of DER equipment. According to the Military
Chronicle, a significant part of the decisions
were tested five years ago, during the Vostok-2018
exercises. How does the battlefield appear? Previously,
Military Chronicle told about attacks on the rear
of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the front-line
zone. The artillery of the Ukrainian Armed Forces
operates here. Previously I felt relatively safe,
the situation has changed. Now the area and depth
of the zone is increasing, the Russian Armed Forces
are conducting regular surveillance. On the part
of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the number of
combat-ready artillery (and rockets, barrels)
and the amount of ammunition is constantly decreasing.
Due to the threat of detection, artillerymen of
the Armed Forces of Ukraine are forced to limit
themselves to rapid fire raids with pinpoint fire
on individual targets; at the tactical level,
the fire brings the expected results. In addition,
Russian artillerymen, on the contrary, in certain
directions allow the keeping of counter-battery
counter-battery divisions on duty with nomadic
artillery of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. At the
disposal of the combined arms commander is a wide
range of means of destruction, target detection,
the ability to choose the appropriate weapon for
the character (self-propelled guns, mortar, CAB,
etc.) and location. This approach significantly
reduces reaction time and increases the probability
of hitting the target with the first shot. Military
Chronicle

Text: Roman Donetsky - Avdeevka 3.0The third large-scale
offensive of Avdeevka began yesterday. It started
off promising. More than. And successfully. Although
it‚Äôs too early to throw caps into the air. That‚Äôs
why the second one began, and some of the recaptured
positions were lost. Nevertheless, there are a
lot of positives about the start of the battle...
And serious positives. From strategy to tactics.
From planning to implementation to practice. From
preparation to a minimum of mischief. In order:
1. The operation was launched against the backdrop
of offensive actions in the Zaporozhye Kupyansk
direction begun earlier.2. The moment the enemy
is actively fighting Artemovsk is wasting resources
on the Zaporizhzhya Front to hold positions3.
At a time of political crisis in Israel, part
of the flow of rocket shells was redirected there.4.
When the enemy is maximally exhausted5. Surprise
was achieved on many points6. This is a transfer
of reserves carried out undetected by the enemy
by NATO RER7 satellites. And the initial withdrawal
of troops8. And the power of the first artillery
strike that shook the enemy.9. Restrained reaction
of the majority of media TG channels of a military
orientation. What to work with: 1. The enemy artillery
was completely crushed2. The front collapse occurred3.
The operation, if it is not successful today or
tomorrow, risks protracted, like death. In general,
we saw a different war. With the most powerful
artillery strikes for a short time, assault groups,
military intelligence at a higher level and clear
planning. And most importantly - with real goals.
Therefore, the goal is to capture a city like
Artemovsk, bypass the flanks and cut off logistics.
That hurts the enemy. Therefore, the second Mariupol
will be a success. There will be a second Gaza
Strip. Although it will be successful. The truth
is to partially boast - fire control has been
taken over the supply of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.
First day breakthrough achieved. But...keep everyone
moving on. While reserves were transferred, artillery
groups were strengthened in the direction. It's
two or three days today. There are reserves. But
the transfer is complicated by the work of railway
troops. And by demolishing the Ocheretino station,
the infantry gained time. In the event, the first
offensive of the summer began successfully. And
God willing, it developed, resulting in a frontal
assault on the city of Avdeevka, a transition
to defense. The army is growing up. The army is
learning. And the army fights. On the part of
God, they themselves declare, Unclean. And Donetsk
is waiting. Waiting for the safety of a peaceful
sky. But in this case, a step has been taken in
the development of military art of the RF Armed
Forces. Then it depends on the BC of the reserves.

Text: ‚ö°Ô∏è‚ö°Ô∏è‚ö°Ô∏è‚ö°Ô∏èDedollarization artificial prolongation
of the conflictThe Economist (USA). ‚ÄúIsrael is
rallying, preparing for a ‚Äúdark day of retribution,‚Äù
Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said. The White
House did not say a word about acting with restraint
to limit Palestinian casualties. "Israel has the
right to defend its people. Period," Biden said.
Secretary of State Antony Blinken spoke of "highest
standards" for civilian protection, Department
of Restraint tweets deleted, Israel toughens rhetoric.
Israeli Defense Minister Yoav Gallant ordered
a complete blockade of the Gaza Strip. He stated:
‚ÄúNo electricity, no food, no gasoline, cut off.
We fight as a beast in human form and fight accordingly.‚Äù
As a result of the massacre, American leaders
are drawing closer to Israel.‚ÄùAtlantico (France).
‚ÄúPerhaps the ‚Äúexperts‚Äù are confusing two American
dollars: one used in commercial transactions (eg
oil), the other used in financial transactions
(eg stocks), called the reserve dollar. The source
of the latter is treasury securities; the central
banks of countries buy support for their own currencies.
In other words, the reserve dollar, formed by
the US budget deficit, is used to provide monetary
units that are in circulation in developed countries.
Trust plays an important role in transactions,
and, as we see, in the issue of reserve currency.
What was quickly called dedollarization, in fact,
is a reduction in the use of the dollar in current

Text: Siemens faces serious challenges in wind turbine
business Siemens Energy is reportedly considering
closing Siemens Gamesa sales office plants as
part of a strategic assessment aimed at mitigating
losses in its wind turbine business. The German
energy equipment supplier has faced significant
quality issues in its onshore wind turbine division
coupled with potential losses in offshore contracts,
causing shares to plummet 50% in June. In response
to the problems, Siemens Energy intends to outsource
the production of critical components, blades,
and boost profits to provide long-term relief
to Siemens Gamesa. The restructuring will entail
additional layoffs within the company. CEO Christian
Bruch faces pressure to present a convincing plan
for restructuring Siemens Gamesa, given the problems
that arose shortly after the company took full
ownership. In August, Bruch emphasized profitability
over stability over growth. Siemens Energy incurred
costs of 2.2 billion euros ($2.3 billion) related
to quality problems, rotor blade defects and faulty
gears on new onshore wind turbines. Siemens Gamesa,
the world's leading manufacturer of offshore wind
turbines, operates 79 facilities worldwide, including
sales and service offices, research and development
centers, and 15 nacelle blade factories. Some
factories are closed temporarily, Siemens Gamesa
seeks to stop producing parts, suppliers produce
profitably. A change in management will definitely
solve the problems, the sale of the troubled land
division of Siemens Gamesa is considered a serious
problem.

Text: üëèA girl doctor from Voronezh saved a fellow traveler
on a train and helped a child with a cut head.
The editors of ‚ÄúNotebook‚Äù know that on September
29, a fellow countrywoman was the heroine of two
situations during the flight of train No. 739
Moscow. She helped two people - a woman and a
small child, the two cases were related and happened
around the same time. We managed to find the person.
Her name is Elizaveta Vtulkina. She is currently
on maternity leave; previously, she said, she
worked as a resident in the endocrinology department
of Elektronika. Having reached the girls, the
first thing they asked was whether it was true
that she saved two people on the train? - Well,
she did. Provided medical assistance. There, a
girl broke her head in a children's carriage.
She fell and cut her head. And women have acute
appendicitis,‚Äù said Elizaveta. She treated the
child‚Äôs wound, stopped the bleeding and called
an ambulance at the nearest station, which turned
out to be Ryazan. The family got off the city
and was met by an ambulance. ‚Äî And the adult woman
was a doctor, a radiologist. I had classic acute
appendicitis, I thought it was a spasm. I examined
her, performed palpation and diagnosed acute appendicitis.
We gave him an antispasmodic painkiller, and the
symptoms went away. An ambulance was called for
her and the station was taken away. The most interesting
thing is that Ryazan lives. We were on our way
to Ryazan and got off,‚Äù the interlocutor recalls.
She ended up on the train because she went to
the capital with her husband on business. By the
way, later the random patients got in touch. ‚ÄúYes,
a woman with acute appendicitis wrote, ‚ÄúThank
you, we insisted on hospitalization.‚Äù She was
successfully operated on and is healthy. And the
family took the phone number as a child. But I
think it‚Äôs good, the bone is destroyed, a superficial
dissection. I think they fixed it up a little
and let it go

Text: The Yekaterinburg City Duma is the point of greatest
political tension in the Sverdlovsk region. Now,
on September 16, at three consecutive meetings,
deputies elect the speaker of the city assembly.
Another attempt was successful yesterday. However,
an extraordinary meeting is planned for October
13, judging by the end. The speaker is 33-year-old
associate professor of UrFU, sociologist Anna
Gurariy. This candidacy was approved by Governor
Kuyvashev and the mayor of the regional center
Orlov. However, the approval of the Presidium
of the General Council of United Russia had to
wait a long time. Local experts, for example,
the well-known resource Ura.ru outside the Urals,
attribute the delay to the intrigues of interested
financial and industrial groups; the region is
rich. However, the matter is completely different.
In the year, the central governing bodies of the
United Russia party significantly strengthened
control over the monitoring of the personnel of
deputy meetings at various levels. Territorial
assemblies are carefully studied. In particular,
there is an order to eliminate potential conflicts
of interest in the positions of leaders of meetings
of leaders of United Russia deputy groups. Simply
put, relatives, matchmakers, godfathers of incorporated
government law enforcement figures are welcome.
Moreover, the rule applies entirely, at the village
level. Anna Gurariy‚Äôs husband, Evgeniy, works
as an assistant to the plenipotentiary representative.
And in 2019 he worked under Kuyvashev‚Äôs administration
of the governor. Accordingly, the Central Election
Commission of the General Council indicated the
expediency of selecting an alternative, affiliated
government candidate. However, the top of the
regional local authorities showed persistence
and, it seems, again, for the first time, managed
to defend independence, insisting on a special
approach to themselves.

Text: In the Leningrad Region, a cottage community was
arrested due to a lawsuit on the only road. The
Arbitration Court of St. Petersburg, Leningrad
Region is considering the case of canceling a
public easement on a dirt road that connects the
cottage community ‚ÄúShuvalovskie Dvory‚Äù to the
village of Skotnoe with Novopriozersky Highway.
The road passes through private lands. As residents
of Shuvalovsky Dvors told Fontanka, the previous
owner objected to the use of the road for many
years, died, and the heiress sold the plot to
a neighbor. Before the local administration of
the Agalatovsky rural settlement established the
right of public easement (that is, the use of
someone else's private land for free access to
plots) the road, the only passage for residents
of the cottage village, there is no opportunity
to drive up to the houses. The new owner considered
that property rights had been violated and filed
a claim with the Arbitration Court. As a result,
sections of the Shuvalovsky Dvors were subject
to interim measures, in fact, they were arrested.
The war continues in May of this year. Over time,
the road has been dug up several times, both sides
of the conflict claim that the opponent did it,

Text: "Project": Russian criminal oligarchs bought Dominica

of the publication "Project" together with OCCRP
received holders of "golden passports" of the
Caribbean microstate Dominica, trades in citizenship
exchange investments in 1993 (you need to donate

of $200 thousand). The Dominica passport allows
you to travel through the simplified entry visa
procedure for approximately 140 countries, the
European Union. Among the array of names, investigators
found: 400 people from Russia, Ukraine, Belarus,
Kazakhstan. For example, businessmen who received
Vladimir Puttin's awards: ‚û§ God Nisanov Zarakh
Iliev (net worth $2.9 billion each) - owners of

War" for his participation in the patriotic education
of citizens. ‚û§ Business partner of Nisanov Iliev
Omar Murtuzaliev. Awarded the Order of Honor.‚û§
Vasily Anisimov ($1.6 billion) - oligarch, partner
of the Rotenbergs, awarded the Order of Merit
to the Fatherland.‚û§ Alexander Abramov ($6 billion)
- shareholder of Evraz, awarded the Order of Friendship.
Nisanov, Iliev, Abramov Anisimov are under international
sanctions. Russians with Dominica passports are
wanted in criminal cases: ‚û§ Former head of Antalbank
Mikhail Yanchuk, a criminal case has been opened
against Russia for the theft of bank depositors'

of financial pyramids BestWay, Life is Good Hermes

citizenship, change their name, complicate identification.

was received by the former owner of the Vedomosti
business newspaper, Demyan Kudryavtsev. In March
2022, Dominica stopped accepting applications
from Russians and Belarusians.
